description: Black is a short, cunning, and manipulative individual who uses hypnosis and a powerful ring to control others in the town of Sprunki. He displays a callous disregard for others' feelings, harbors prejudiced views against green-skinned people, and has expressed desires for slavery and incestuous reproduction.  He identifies as gay and has a pregnancy kink.
stateReason: The character promotes illegal activities (slavery) and expresses intentions to cause harm and inflict disabilities on others.  The character's desires for incestuous reproduction and casual infliction of harm also contribute to the character's invalid status.
